post021.title: Inspirational Artists: Pascal Campion
post021.author: Onyx Cinema, Inc.
post021.description:
Every Monday through Friday morning for the past 4 years, I have gotten an email from my friend, Pascal. In fact, I have an entire folder dedicated to Pascal Campion with over 1,000 e-mails. And in each email is an attached image. It's his "Sketch of the Day (SOTD)." Every SOTD is a story that Pascal tells with his amazing talent.

Pascal has thousands of fans following his SOTD, but if you ask him, he'll tell you that they are not fans, they are all his friends. That is just the type of person he is.

This video is a glimpse into his process and his insight. Watch as he translates emotion into art.

Thanks for watching!

Directed - Anthony Vu
Music - Esther Wong (ywwonglp.wordpress.com)
Production Assistant - Nimalee Wickremasinghe
Editing Assistant - Marcus Valerio
Special Thanks - Josh Tran and Michael Shu

PascalCampion.com
OnyxCinema.com

post015.title: Introduction to Earth Science
post015.author: Frank Gregorio
post015.description:
This is a 4:45 minute HD dramatic video choreographed to powerful music, which introduces the viewer to the wonder of Earth Science. It is designed as a "trailer" to be shown in classrooms by Earth Science and Physical Science teachers in high school and college as a visual "Introduction" to the beauty and complexity of the planet Earth.

Subscribe to my channel for other video trailers in Earth Science, Astronomy and Biology. I will be releasing new ones periodically. I wish to thank all of the video and music producers whose postings enabled me to create this video.

I can customize this video to add your name or school name at the end credits, for a very modest fee. If interested, email me at "fsgregs@comcast.net"

Please rate this video and feel free to comment. If you like it, please help me spread the word. The more students who can enjoy these dramatic videos, the better!

post010.author: Perception Pictures
post010.description:
A man returns to the Midwestern farm of his childhood on a desperate mission to unearth the horrifying truth of what landed there in the summer of 1960.    View trailer: https://vimeo.com/55338337

imdb.com/title/tt2831474   |   www.thelandingfilm.com/  |  facebook.com/thelandingQPIXFILM

post019.title: Strokes of Creativity: Education
post019.author: FIELD
post019.description:
"Strokes of Creativity" is a dynamic video installation developed for the Great Festival of Creativity; a series of exclusive business events initiated by the British Government to foster professional relationships with emerging markets through an exhibition, lectures and masterclasses. 

The Welcome Installation presents a unique animation for each of the categories comprised in the event: from fashion, design, and luxury, to technology, innovation, education. With a custom playback system driven by the event schedule, the display announces events of the upcoming hours with a clean graphical overlay.

www.field.io/project/welcome-installation
